title: New Horizons
description: Alliances and enemies are made, but the Stone Raiders keep their promise. They swore to themselves they would bring the Aleph back to Emerilia.  Secrets, powerful creatures and a hidden civilization wait for the Stone Raiders in the abandoned Aleph facilities and cities.  Will they be able to clear the Aleph facilities and complete their quest? Or will they be fated to fail?  One thing is for sure, the Stone Raiders won't give up easily.
author: Michael  Chatfield
